siteMetadata.bio: Ammon Richards is an accomplished graduate of Brigham Young University-Idaho (BYUI) and is currently advancing his academic journey at Western Governors University (WGU), where he is pursuing both a Bachelor’s and a Master’s degree in Information Technology. Ammon is passionate about leveraging his skills and knowledge through various projects, which he undertakes to stay intellectually stimulated and engaged.
